sourcesContent:
import '../styles/tour-details.css' import React, { useRef, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' import avatar from "../assets/images/avatar.jpg" import Booking from '../components/Booking/Booking' import Newsletter from '../shared/Newsletter' import useFetch from './../hooks/useFetch' import { BASE_URL } from './../utils/config' const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams() const reviewMsgRef = useRef("") const [tourRating, setTourRating] = useState(null) const [newReview, setNewReview] = useState("") // Fetch data from the database const { data: tour, loading, error } = useFetch(`${BASE_URL}/tours/${id}`) const { photo, title, desc, price, reviews, address, city, distance, maxGroupSize } = tour || {} const { totalRating, avgRating } = calculateAvgRating(reviews) const options = { day: "numeric", month: "long", year: "numeric" } const submitHandler = e => { e.preventDefault() const reviewText = reviewMsgRef.current.value if (!reviewText || !tourRating) { return; // Ensure both rating and review text are filled } // Send the review to the backend (Assuming you have an API for that) const newReviewData = { rating: tourRating, text: reviewText, tourId: id, userName: 'Pranta', // This should be dynamic if you have a user logged in date: new Date().toLocaleDateString("en-US", options), } // Replace with an API call to save the review console.log(newReviewData) setNewReview(reviewText) // You can set the state to refresh the reviews list reviewMsgRef.current.value = "" // Clear the input after submitting setTourRating(null) // Reset rating } return ( <>

{title}

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ("Not rated") : ( ({reviews?.length}) )} {address}
{city} ${price} /per person {distance} km {maxGroupSize} people
Description

{desc}

{/*============== Tour Review Section ============== */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map(rating => ( setTourRating(rating)}> {rating} ))}
{ reviews?.map((review, index) => (
{review.userName || 'Anonymous'}

{new Date(review.date).toLocaleDateString("en-US", options)}

{review.rating}
{review.text}
)) }
{/*============== Tour Review Section End ============== */}
) } export default TourDetails
